alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing an oxane (tetrahydropyran) ring, which is a six-member saturated aliphatic heterocycle with one oxygen atom and five carbon atoms.
alternative_parents.name: Oxanes

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a pyrrolidine moiety that is substituted at the N1-position with an alkyl group. Pyrrolidine is a five-membered saturated aliphatic heterocycle with one nitrogen atom and four carbon atoms.
alternative_parents.name: N-alkylpyrrolidines

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing one carbohydrate unit not glycosidically linked to another such unit, and no set of two or more glycosidically linked carbohydrate units. Monosaccharides have the general formula CnH2nOn.
alternative_parents.name: Monosaccharides

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a monothioacetal functional group with the general structure R2C(OR')(SR').
alternative_parents.name: Monothioacetals

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a trialkylamine group, characterized by exactly three alkyl groups bonded to the amino nitrogen.
alternative_parents.name: Trialkylamines

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a secondary alcohol functional group, with the general structure HOC(R)(R') (R,R'=alkyl, aryl).
alternative_parents.name: Secondary alcohols

alternative_parents.description: Organosulfur compounds a sulfenyl group with the general formula RS (R = organyl).
alternative_parents.name: Sulfenyl compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic 1,3-dipolar compounds with the general structure  X#N+-Z- <-> X-=N+=Z <-> X-=N-Z+ <-> X-N=Z (X = C or O, Z = C, N, or O).
alternative_parents.name: Propargyl-type 1,3-dipolar organic compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing more than one hydroxyl groups.
alternative_parents.name: Polyols

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an heterocycle with at least one oxygen atom linked to a ring carbon.
alternative_parents.name: Oxacyclic compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an heterocycle with at least one nitrogen atom and one carbon atom linked to each other.
alternative_parents.name: Azacyclic compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic acids with the general formula RC(=N)-OH (R=H, organic group).
alternative_parents.name: Carboximidic acids

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Organic salts that results from the reaction of hydrochloric acid with an organic base.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrochlorides

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a chemical bond between a carbon atom and a chlorine atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organochlorides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the alkyl chloride functional group with formula R-Cl , where R is an alkyl group.
alternative_parents.name: Alkyl chlorides

class.description: Organic compounds containing a bond between a carbon atom and an oxygen atom.
class.name: Organooxygen compounds

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as thioglycosides. These are glycoside in which a sugar group is bonded through one carbon to another group via a S-glycosidic bond.

direct_parent.description: Glycoside in which a sugar group is bonded through one carbon to another group via a S-glycosidic bond.
direct_parent.name: Thioglycosides

intermediate_nodes.description: Carbohydrate derivatives in which a sugar group is bonded through its anomeric carbon to another group via a C-, S-,N-,O-, or Se- glycosidic bond.
intermediate_nodes.name: Glycosyl compounds

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Monosaccharides, disaccharides, oligosaccharides, polysaccharides, and their derivatives.
subclass.name: Carbohydrates and carbohydrate conjugates

superclass.description: Organic compounds that contain one or more oxygen atoms.
superclass.name: Organic oxygen compounds
